revised_title: Edward George Bowen: A Pioneering Physicist in Radar and Radioastronomy
tldr: Edward George Bowen was a British physicist who made significant contributions to radar technology and radioastronomy. He played a crucial role in the early development of radar during World War II and later led the Division of Radiophysics in Australia, where he helped establish the new science of radioastronomy and improve rainfall in dry areas.
